title: 2016년 Walker, Gamaliel Daniel 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Walker, Gamaliel Daniel. 판결일: 2016-06-08. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Walker, Gamaliel Daniel
**판결일**: 2016-06-08
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약

              IN THE COURT OF CRIMINAL APPEALS
                          OF TEXAS
                                         NO. WR-84,975-01


                   EX PARTE GAMALIEL DANIEL WALKER, Applicant


                 ON APPLICATION FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS
                CAUSE NO. 13-12-4751-CR IN THE 24TH DISTRICT COURT
                              FROM GOLIAD COUNTY


        Per curiam.

                                            OPINION

        Pursuant to the provisions of Article 11.07 of the Texas Code of Criminal Procedure, the

clerk of the trial court transmitted to this Court this application for a writ of habeas corpus. Ex parte

Young, 418 S.W.2d 824, 826 (Tex. Crim. App. 1967). Applicant was convicted of assault family

violence and sentenced to three years’ imprisonment.

        Applicant contends that his counsel rendered ineffective assistance because he failed to

timely file a notice of appeal.

        The trial court has determined that counsel failed to timely file a notice of appeal. We find

that Applicant is entitled to the opportunity to file an out-of-time appeal of the judgment of
                                                                                                        2

conviction in Cause No. 13-12-4751-CR from the 24th District Court of Goliad County. Applicant

is ordered returned to that time at which he may give a written notice of appeal so that he may then,

with the aid of counsel, obtain a meaningful appeal. W...
